verbs.description: evaluate (third-person singular simple present evaluates, present participle evaluating, simple past and past participle evaluated)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To draw conclusions from examining; to assess.
examples: It will take several years to evaluate the material gathered in the survey.

entries.meaning: (transitive, mathematics, computing) To compute or determine the value of (an expression).
(intransitive, computing, mathematics) To return or have a specific value.
